seo.title: Z-Image - Photorealistic AI Image Generation Service | Sub-second Bilingual Text Rendering
seo.description: Generate photorealistic AI images online with Z-Image. Supports accurate Chinese and English text rendering, sub-second generation speed, and affordable pricing for professional AI image creation.

hero.subtitle: Experience photorealistic AI image generation service powered by Z-Image model, with accurate bilingual text rendering. We provide sub-second generation speed and affordable pricing to make professional AI image creation accessible to everyone.

what.title: What is Z-Image?
what.description: Z-Image is our photorealistic AI image generation service, based on advanced Scalable Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer architecture. We provide fast, affordable, and high-quality AI image generation solutions to make professional creation accessible.

core1.title: Photorealistic Quality
core1.description: Z-Image excels at photorealistic image generation with fine control over details, lighting, and textures. It maintains high fidelity while demonstrating strong aesthetic quality in composition and overall mood.

core2.title: Accurate Bilingual Text Rendering
core2.description: Z-Image accurately renders Chinese and English text while preserving facial realism and overall aesthetic composition, with results comparable to top-tier closed-source models. In poster design, it demonstrates strong compositional skills and typography sense, delivering high-quality text even in challenging scenarios with small font sizes.

core3.title: Prompt Enhancement & Reasoning
core3.description: Powerful Prompt Enhancer (PE) uses structured reasoning chains to inject logic and common sense, enabling the model to handle complex tasks like the 'Chicken and Rabbit Problem' or visualizing classical Chinese poetry. In editing tasks, even with ambiguous instructions, the model can infer underlying intent for logically coherent results.

why.title: Why Choose Our Z-Image Service?
why.subtitle: Our Z-Image service makes professional AI image creation simple and efficient with sub-second generation speed, accurate text rendering, and affordable pricing.

traditional.item1: Takes hours or days to complete professional image design

quality.description: Generated images feature photorealistic effects with fine control over details, lighting, and textures. Whether portraits or product displays, achieve excellent visual results.

cost.title: Accurate Text Rendering
cost.description: Supports accurate Chinese and English text rendering, perfect for poster design, advertising creation, and more. Even small-sized text renders clearly for professional designs.

flexibility.title: Intelligent Prompt Understanding
flexibility.description: Our service features powerful prompt comprehension capabilities, accurately understanding and generating expected images even from complex or ambiguous descriptions.

support.title: Easy to Use
support.description: No professional design skills required. Simply describe your ideas in natural language to generate professional AI images. Making creation accessible to everyone.

security.title: Affordable Pricing
security.description: Pay-as-you-go model with transparent and reasonable pricing. Significantly reduces your creation costs compared to traditional design services, making professional AI image creation accessible to all.

how.title: How to Use Z-Image?
how.subtitle: Four simple steps to begin your AI creative journey

step1.title: Enter Your Prompt
step1.description: Describe the image you want in simple text. Supports English and Chinese input.

step2.title: Choose Parameters
step2.description: Select image size, adjust random seed, and other parameters to customize your creation.

step3.title: Click Generate
step3.description: Click the generate button, and AI will create beautiful images for you in seconds.

step4.title: Download & Use
step4.description: Once generated, preview, download, or share your artwork.

items.question: How fast is Z-Image generation?
items.answer: Z-Image achieves performance comparable to or exceeding leading competitors with only 8 steps, delivering sub-second inference latency on enterprise-grade H800 GPUs. On consumer devices like RTX 3090 or 4090, it takes approximately 2-3 seconds, and mid-range cards take about 4-5 seconds, requiring only 16G VRAM.

items.question: What advantages does Z-Image have in text rendering?
items.answer: Z-Image accurately renders complex Chinese and English text while maintaining facial realism and overall aesthetic composition, with results comparable to top-tier closed-source models. In poster design, it demonstrates strong compositional skills and typography sense, delivering high-quality text even in challenging scenarios with small font sizes.

items.question: What is the Prompt Enhancement feature?
items.answer: Prompt Enhancer (PE) uses structured reasoning chains to inject logic and common sense, enabling the model to transcend surface-level descriptions and tap into underlying world knowledge for complex tasks like the 'Chicken and Rabbit Problem' or visualizing classical Chinese poetry. Even with ambiguous instructions, it can infer underlying intent for logically coherent results.

items.question: How is Z-Image's photorealistic quality?
items.answer: Z-Image excels at photorealistic image generation with fine control over details, lighting, and textures. It balances high fidelity with strong aesthetic quality in composition and overall mood. Generated images are not only realistic but also visually appealing.

items.question: What architecture does Z-Image use?
items.answer: Z-Image adopts a Scalable Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer (S3-DiT) architecture. Text, visual semantic tokens, and image VAE tokens are concatenated at the sequence level to serve as a unified input stream into the Transformer backbone, maximizing parameter efficiency compared to dual-stream approaches.

items.question: How does Z-Image compare to other models?
items.answer: According to Elo-based Human Preference Evaluation (on Alibaba AI Arena), Z-Image shows highly competitive performance against other leading models while achieving state-of-the-art results among open-source models.
